text:
@ChrisMurphyCT That's a tactical decision dude. It's to combat global warming. EPA is replaced by Coronavirus. Coronavirus has serious impact on manufacturing, hence less pollution. 
.
Disclaimer: it was a joke.
.
On a serious note, both saddens me
#CoronavirusOutbreak #GlobalWarming
